INTSHAYELELO

iOfisi Ymkhuseli Wabathengi inoxanduva lokuncedisa abathengi baseNtshona Koloni ngezikhalazo zabo kwanokubafundisa ngemiba yokuba ngabathengi.

Le Ofisi iquka la macandelo mathathu:
* iCandelo Lolawulo Lwezikhalazo
* iCandelo Elijongene Nokufundisa Abathengi
* iCandelo Elijongene Noshishino Ngendlela Engenamkhethe


 

INKUNDLA YABATHENGI

iOfisi Yomkhuseli Wabathengi isebenza "njengomtshutshini" egameni labathengi ukuze beze nezikhalazo/namatyala abo kwiNkundla Yabathengi, eyinkundla eyodwa echophela amatyala abathengi.

 

UKUFUNDISWA KWABATHENGI

Le Ofisi sele yakhupha nothotho lweencwadi ngeenjongo zokuncedisa ekuthengeni izinto abazifunayo:

* Iinqwelo-mafutha: Ukuzithenga Nokuzilungisa
* Ukuthenga Ngetyala
* Consumer Survival Guide
* Ukubekela
* Umthunywa Wenkundla
